tool_description: You can get all of league of legends champions list. With more than 140 champions, you’ll find the perfect match for your playstyle. This api get you all information about the champion with 14+ different language.
name: League of Legends Champions
title: League of Legends Champions

api_list.name: Get Region Detail
api_list.description: You can get region detail with different language.

required_parameters.name: slug
required_parameters.description: You can get this values get regions endpoint method.

api_list.name: Get Statics
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you champion statics. This statics can filtered time period and league.

optional_parameters.name: tier
optional_parameters.description:
You can filtered league name for example ;
Iron, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Master, Grandmaster, Challenger

api_list.name: Get Regions
api_list.description: You can get all league of legends regions with different languages

api_list.name: Get Champion Detail
api_list.description: You can get champion all information with different language

api_list.name: Get Champions
api_list.description: You can list of league of legends champions with different language.This api have a pagination you can get max 10 champions for per request.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: you can get max 10 champions per request
